name: Merchant Unions
background: The Guilds of the Nexus are various factions of violent and deranged outlaws that wage eternal guild wars on the streets of the Nexus. These guilds are joined by mercenaries which are not bound to any particular guild, and which fight for anyone that can provide riches or a worthy cause.

spells.name: Defiant Stance
spells.effect: Pick up to two friendly units within 12", which get Grounded Precision once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (params.aura ? this.AuraSize : 1), avgUnit: !params.thisUnit }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Battering Burst
spells.effect: Pick one enemy unit within 12", which takes 2 hits with Reap.

spells.name: Iron Clash
spells.effect: Pick up to four enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Relentless against once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: { name: params.effect.unitRule.name, rating: params.effect.unitRule.rating, multiplier: params.multiplier * (this._skirmish ? 1 : this.AuraSize), avgUnit: true }

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Deadly Whirlwind
spells.effect: Pick up to two enemy units within 12", which take 3 hits each.

spells.name: Strengthen Legs
spells.effect: Pick up to six friendly units within 12", which moves +2" when using Advance actions and +4" when using Rush/Charge actions once (next time the effect would apply).

parameters.name: effectDuration
parameters.value: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? this.getSpeed(unit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value }) : 0

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

costFormula.value: params.thisUnit ? 0 : this.getSpeed(this.AverageUnit, { advance: params.effect.advanceSpeed.value, rush: params.effect.rushSpeed.value })

effectDuration.name: once (next time the effect would apply)

spells.name: Crushing Blow
spells.effect: Pick up to three enemy models within 18", which take 2 hits with AP(1) each.

specialRules.name: Fortified
specialRules.description: When units where all models have this rule take hits, those hits count as having AP(-1), to a min. of AP(0).

specialRules.name: Repel Ambushers
specialRules.description: Enemy units using Ambush must be set up over 12" away from this model's unit.

specialRules.name: No Retreat Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get No Retreat. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Grounded Reinforcement Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Grounded Reinforcement. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Shred
specialRules.description: On unmodified results of 1 to block hits, this weapon deals 1 extra wound.

specialRules.name: Mend
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick one friendly model within 3" with Tough, and remove D3 wounds from it.

specialRules.name: Grounded Precision Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Grounded Precision. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Strider Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Strider. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Bane in Melee Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Bane in melee. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Shooter Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Hit & Run Shooter. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: Union Assault
specialRules.description: After this model is deployed, it may be placed anywhere fully within 9 of its position.

specialRules.name: Bounding
specialRules.description: When this unit is activated, you may place all models with this rule in it anywhere fully within D3+1" of their position.

specialRules.name: Reap
specialRules.description: Against units where most models have Defense 2+ to Defense 3+, this weapon gets AP(+2).

specialRules.name: Relentless Mark
specialRules.description: Once per activation, before attacking, pick up to 4 enemy units within 18", which friendly units gets Relentless against once (next time the effect would apply).

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance Aura
specialRules.description: This model and up to 3 friendly units picked before the start of the game get Rapid Advance. If this model is killed, picked models that are deployed lose the rule.

specialRules.name: AP
specialRules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits.

specialRules.name: Ambush
specialRules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9 away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambush units, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

specialRules.name: No Retreat
specialRules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test that causes it to be Shaken or Routed, the test counts as passed instead. Then, roll as many dice as the number of wounds it would take to check for wound effects (must always roll at least 1 die), and for each result of 1-3 the unit takes one wound, which can't be ignored.

specialRules.name: Grounded Reinforcement
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule has most of them within 1" of terrain, they get +1 to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Reinforcement
specialRules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule is Shaken or fully destroyed, you may remove it from the table as destroyed and place a new copy of it fully within 12" of any table edge at the beginning of the next round after Ambushers have been deployed. Units that deploy via Reinforcement cant seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy, and this rule doesnt apply to the new copy of the unit.

specialRules.name: Tough
specialRules.description: This model only rolls to check wound effects once it has taken at least X wounds, and is only Knocked Out on rolls of 5+X or more.

specialRules.name: Grounded Precision
specialRules.description: If a unit where all models have this rule has most of them within 1" of terrain, they get +1 to hit rolls when attacking.

specialRules.name: Strider
specialRules.description: May ignore the effects of difficult terrain when moving, and only needs 2+ to pass jumping rolls.

specialRules.name: Bane
specialRules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after shooting or being in melee.

specialRules.name: Hit & Run Shooter
specialRules.description: Once per round, units where all models have this rule may move by up to 3" after shooting.

specialRules.name: Defense
specialRules.description: This model gets +X to defense rolls.

specialRules.name: Relentless
specialRules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

specialRules.name: Rapid Advance
specialRules.description: This model moves +4" when using Advance actions.
